page.title: 10J & F Pool Ltd.
page.content: J.&.F Pool's Ltd. started in 1848 taking over some of the buildings owned by the Cornish Copper Company. They employ nearly 300 people.You can start work as a general factory labourer at 16.A technician needs good 'o' levels and to have completed a 5 year technician's apprentiship or have a higher national certificate.They operate a three shift system of work hours.Pool's manufacture perforated metal and security products such as safes and strongrooms.They make military catering equipment like field kitchens,ovens and petrol fired cookers;cabinets for cable television and anything else that people wish to buy made of metal.They sell their products to industries for both the home and overseas market.Pool's perforated metal is found in just about every manufactured product.
